name: @fylgja/aria-only
description: The aria-only (a.k.a. sr-only) visually hides elements. But keeps it accessible to screen-readers and other aria tools
author: Fylgja

scripts.build:mq:new: npx sass src/mq.scss mq.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build:mq: npm run build:mq:new && npm run build:mq:legacy
scripts.build:main: npx sass src/main.scss aria-only.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:mq && npm run build:main
